name: Teethhealthinfo
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Taking good care of our teeth is hygienic. The mouth is actually home to thousands of harmful bacteria and if you do not have your teeth cleaned and checked professionally, you could be prone to oral bacteria-related illnesses. Many people think that brushing their teeth is enough.

Perfect teeth and jaw line, can bring out an attractive smile in a person.

However, the development of new technologies in dentistry necessitates the attention of committed dentists and dental work experts.
Enable our skill and stay updated with the latest news , discoveries, tips and tricks.

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. 

If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
